title: Online Task-Based Scientific English Communication Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Understanding of Scientific Terminology
context.additional_context: PBL Environment for Novice Science Learners to Complete Academic Assignments in English Using Digital Devices, with Continuous Feedback Through Formative Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can write scientific lab reports in English and demonstrate academic expressions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their assignment deliverables at least three times by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can maintain over 90% participation in science discussion tasks using online collaboration tools (e.g., Zoom).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
